  • Method Details

    • addAssistant

      public void addAssistant(Assistant assistant) throws InvalidActionException, AlreadyPlayedAssistantException, SameAssistantPlayedException
      Adds an Assistant to the playedAssistant ArrayList
      Parameters:
      assistant - the Assistant to add
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the player who is trying to play the Assistant is not the one actually playing this turn
      AlreadyPlayedAssistantException - if the player who is trying to play the Assistant has already played it
      SameAssistantPlayedException - if the Assistant who is trying to be played has already been played by someone else this turn

    • isAssistantPlayable

      private boolean isAssistantPlayable(Assistant assistant)
      Checks if the selected Assistant is playable
      Parameters:
      assistant - the Assistant to check
      Returns:
      true if the Assistan has a different value from all the other values of the other assistans played or if the current Player has no other playable assistant
